message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Thanks for the offer Alice, but $12000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product, which is a fair price considering what I'm willing to spend. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $10500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering $11500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm counteroffering $11750. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.
